Title: Liverpool face Isak dilemma ahead of Arsenal visit to Anfield
Summary: Liverpool and Arsenal have combined to spend nearly £550 million ($742 million) in a transfer arms race . The future of Newcastle forward Alexander Isak still hangs over Sunday’s showdown between the Premier League title rivals . Defending champions Liverpool are set to face Arsenal at Anfield on Sunday .

Title: Court seizes $6m shares from ex-army general
Summary: Court seizes $6m shares from ex-army general convicted of corruption . Justice Dehinde Dipeolu of the Federal High Court in Lagos ruled that the shares were seized .

Title: Nigeria Air Force opens recruitment for DSSC 34/2025
Summary: The Nigerian Air Force has announced the commencement of its Direct Short Service Commission (DSSC) Course 34/2025 recruitment exercise . Qualified graduates and postgraduates across various professions are invited to apply . According to an official statement, the online registration portal will be open .

Title: Brace Foundation awards N17m in scholarships to 34 children with special needs
Summary: Brace Foundation has awarded N17 million in scholarships to 34 children with special needs . The scholarships aim to remove financial barriers and ensure that children living with disabilities have equal access to quality education .

Title: Dozens of bandits neutralised in Kwara, says government source
Summary: Dozens of bandits implicated in recent security breaches in Ifelodun Local Government Area of Kwara state have been neutralised in a coordinated onslaught by security forces in their hideouts . The wife of the traditional ruler of Babanla has been whisked away from the scene .

Title: Katsina to conduct survey on malnutrition prevalence
Summary: The Katsina State Government has launched a survey aimed at identifying communities affected by the recent malnutrition crisis . The state’s Acting Governor, Faruq Lawal Jobe, said the objective was to explore the prevalence of malnutrition among the under-five children, and identify household and community levels of food security status in the state .
